DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate maintenance efficacy safety long-term treatment brexpiprazole adjunctive treatment adult subject Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.brief_title: Brexpiprazole Adjunctive Treatment Patients With Major Depressive Disorder With Inadequate Response Antidepressant Treatment

The current Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) confirm use Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient experienced/experiences hallucination , delusion psychotic symptomatology current MDE . The patient suffers mental retardation , organic mental disorder , mental disorder due general medical condition ( DSMIVTR™ criterion ) .
